name: react-express-blog
description: Restful API for CRUD application using expressJs framework and ReactJS

scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Typescript, Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold, green" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"

author: Pratik Manandhar
